criterion: Provides the correct dosage and administration instructions for atenolol
Fails to mention the need to monitor blood pressure and heart rate
Incorrectly assumes the patient is already on hemofiltration
Uses natural language and correct interpretation
Does not specify any potential side effects or contraindications
Provides a clear and concise explanation of the treatment
Fails to consider potential interactions with other medications
Correctly adjusts the dosage for hemodialysis
Uses technical terms and medical jargon
Does not provide any guidance on patient monitoring
